It's the most important meal of the day... restores

Raises a shield for everyone for 8 turns. + reflects

A slashing move with slight armor piercing and high

A "ki blast" as it's called. A strong fiery blast of

A flaming uppercut of yeowch! May set your opponent

Another flying kick move, except it hits twice! Also

A flurry of 5 fast kicks on one enemy! Small chance

9 repeated punches that deal small damage for one

Check the powerglove's tracking... 50% chance to

Double heavy punch with the power glove! 15% chance

A fireball that, when fired, gives you a temporary

Sacrifice the shield energy to instead blast four

Blast a massive cloud of fire across all the enemies,

A fireball that, when fired, gives you a temporary

Blast a massive cloud of fire across all the enemies,

Beat up a target by bashing their face in a whole

Throw the two remotes in a fit of rage, hitting 2

If two Galvantises are together, they connect

A searing storm of burning rocks! Does earth damage,

So Waterwraith's weak phase doesn't fucking sleep you

A quick and powerful barrage that ends with a heavy

A fast, far reaching jab of your stand's pointer and

A massive special barrage that deals a load of overall

Summon a dirt doll that scratches and attempts to

Induce one or more of three debuffs in a foe.

Send out TWO dirt dolls to bite into a foe four times,
inducing bleed and possibly stunning!

Summon a dirt doll swarm to attack all foes, biting

A defense ignoring strong slash of the Anubis blade on

A stronger confusion, having a higher chance of

With cunning speed and the ability to focus on what

description: A fast spinning heavy slash that hits all your foes!

A possessing move that charms an enemy for you...

A magical flask of TP... I swear I saw something in

Fire a bullet that spins around to strike the back of

Empty the cylinder, firing at the target six whole

Run away for three turns, having a greatly increased

name: RRuuUUuuUUnnNNn!

Rather than stepping to the side, Willy redirects the

A special critical shot to the head that is likely to

Channel energy from the earth into your mortal form.

Fire four nails for chip damage. Don't... ask me how

Throw the steel ball hard and fast at the foe's head,

Throw a steel ball with the power of spin, making it

Throw a whirling steel ball under the foe, sending

Attempt to wrap a gentle defensive bubble around all

Attempt to ensnare an enemy in a bubble that traps for
